name: Scrapyard Skirmish
description:
This game was developed for the 2020 Global Game Jam. The theme of the jam was "repair". 

In Scrapyard Skirmish, you and a friend go head to head in a fast-paced split-screen strategy. 

How To Play  

The objective of the game is to destroy the other player.

The map is filled with Junk and broken Robots. You can Salvage either of these to gain Scrap.

Scrap is used to Repair robots, which will then follow you and attack your opponent and his robots. 

You can issue two types of commands to your robots. The Recall command tells them to retreat and return to you, while the Attack command sends them against any nearby enemies.

Player 1 
  • Move : WASD
  • Repair : R
  • Salvage : T
  • Recall Units : Y
  • Order Attack : U
Player 2 
  • Move : Arrow Keys
  • Repair : num 4
  • Salvage : num 5
  • Recall Units : num 6
  • Order Attack : num +
